AI Description: R-BioMart is an R interface to the BioMart database that provides access to a wide range of biological databases. It allows users to query and retrieve data from various biological resources, such as Ensembl and UniProt, through a unified API.
Core Features: Querying & Retrieving Data From Biological Databases, Access To Diverse Biological Resources Like Ensembl & Uniprot, Unified Api For Seamless Data Access
General Tags: Bioinformatics, Data Retrieval, Biological Databases, Data Query
